europeana:record.dc:title: En de naam is .... Synarmadillo pallidus (Crutacea: Isopoda: Armadiliidae)
Nederlandse Faunistische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Soesbergen M.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Invertebrata: algemeen
Verspreiding; Nederland; Herkenning
europeana:record.dc:description: summary And the name is .... Synarmadillo pallidus (Crustacea: Isopoda: Armadillidae) In Soesbergen (2003) an unidentified Synarmadillo species was mentioned as a first record for the Dutch fauna. The isopod was found in a greenhouse in the zoo of Blijdorp, Rotterdam. A study of the literature on Synarmadillo has now clarified the specific status: its name is Synarmadillo pallidus Arcangeli, 1950.
